name: Seedrs Limited
membership: European Crowdfunding Network; UK Crowdfunding Association; Innovate Finance; UK Business Angels Association.
goal:
Seedrs is a leading marketplace for venture capital and private equity investment. We operate an online platform which:

(1) Provides investors of all shapes and sizes—including retail, intermediary and institutional—a transparent, straightforward and cost-efficient way to invest in the equity of private companies; and

(2) Offers growing private companies—from seed-stage to pre-IPO—access to a broad base of investors who can provide patient capital together with community engagement.

Seedrs is authorised and regulated by the UK Financial Conduct Authority.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Competition, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Fraud prevention, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives: Seedrs participates in regular events organised by the European Parliament and European Commission. Focus areas include: crowdfunding policy, Financial Services, EU Digital Single Market; Capital Markets Union, Payment Services; FinTech; GDPR; Taxation; Small Business regulatory environment
